      • getPropertyValueInLinkedToHub

        public static java.lang.Object getPropertyValueInLinkedToHub(Hub thisHub,
                                             java.lang.Object linkObject)
        Used to get the property value in the Linked To Hub, that is used to set the Linked From Hub Active Object.

        Example:
        If Department Hub is linked to a Employee Hub on property "department", then for any Employee object, this will return the value of employee.getDepartment().

        See Also:
        Full Description of Linking Hubs

      • getLinkToProperty

        public static java.lang.String getLinkToProperty(Hub thisHub)
        Returns the property that this Hub is linked to.

        Example:
        DepartmentHub linked to Employee.department will return "department"

        See Also:
        Full Description of Linking Hubs

      • getLinkSetMethod

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method getLinkSetMethod(Hub thisHub)
        Used for linking/connecting Hubs, to get method used to set the property value of the active object in the masterHub to the active object in this Hub.
        See Also:
        updateLinkProperty, Full Description of Linking Hubs, HubLink

      • updateLinkedToHub

        protected static void updateLinkedToHub(Hub fromHub,
                     Hub linkToHub,
                     java.lang.Object obj)
        This is called by HubLinkEventListener, (which is created in this class) whenever the linked to (linkToHub) Hub is changed (active object or linked to property). This will handle recursive hubs, hubs that have master/detail that are linked to themselves, etc. Called by HubLinkEventListener, which is created by Hub.setLinkHub(...) methods.

      • updateLinkedToHub

        protected static void updateLinkedToHub(Hub fromHub,
                     Hub linkToHub,
                     java.lang.Object obj,
                     java.lang.String changedPropName)
